hero.heading: Sell Your Las Vegas House Fast - Cash or with Top Agents
hero.subheading: Get a fair cash offer in 24 hours OR work with top 1% agents. You choose. No repairs, no fees. Close in 7-14 days.

sections.heading: Your Trusted Real Estate Investment Brokerage in Las Vegas
sections.content:
For over 10 years, Alchemy Investments RE has been helping Las Vegas homeowners sell their properties quickly and hassle-free. As a licensed brokerage (S.0184768), we offer something unique: **two ways to sell your house**.

Choose an instant cash offer for a fast, simple sale in 7-14 days. Or work with our top 1% agents to maximize your home's value on the open market. Either way, you get expert guidance, fair treatment, and a stress-free experience.

sections.heading: Two Ways to Sell Your Las Vegas Home
sections.description: Unlike other companies, we give you options. Choose the path that works best for your situation.

options.title: Option 1: Get an Instant Cash Offer
benefits: Close in as little as 7-14 days
options.ideal: Perfect if you need to sell fast, have a distressed property, or want to avoid the traditional selling process.

options.title: Option 2: Work with Top 1% Agents
options.ideal: Perfect if your home is in good condition, you want top dollar, and you have time for the traditional market.

sections.heading: Moving from California to Las Vegas?
sections.content:
You're not alone. Thousands of Californians are making the move to Las Vegas every year for lower taxes, affordable housing, and a better quality of life.

If you need to sell your California property quickly to make the move, or if you're looking to invest in Las Vegas real estate, we can help. Our team understands both markets and can guide you through the transition.
benefits: No California income tax in Nevada

sections.heading: Las Vegas Real Estate Market 2026
sections.content:
The Las Vegas housing market remains strong in 2026, with high buyer demand and limited inventory creating a seller's market. Average home prices in the Las Vegas Valley are around $475,000, with Henderson slightly higher and North Las Vegas offering more affordable options.

Whether you're selling a luxury home in Summerlin or a starter home in the Arts District, now is an excellent time to sell. Our team stays on top of market trends to ensure you get the best possible offer.

faqs.question: How fast can you really buy my house?
faqs.answer: We can close in as little as 7-14 days if you choose our cash offer option. The timeline is flexible—if you need more time, we can accommodate that too. Unlike traditional sales that take 30-60+ days, our streamlined process moves quickly.

faqs.question: Do I have to make repairs before selling?
faqs.answer: No! We buy houses as-is in ANY condition. Whether your home needs minor cosmetic work or major repairs, we'll make you a fair cash offer without requiring any fixes. You can sell your house exactly as it is today.

faqs.question: What's the difference between your cash offer and working with an agent?
faqs.answer: Our cash offer option is faster (7-14 days vs 30-60+ days), requires no repairs, and has no agent fees. Working with one of our top agents typically nets a higher sale price but takes longer and may require some prep work. We'll help you understand both options and choose what's best for your situation.

faqs.question: Are there any fees or commissions?
faqs.answer: With our cash offer option, there are NO fees, commissions, or closing costs. If you work with one of our agents, standard real estate commissions apply (typically 5-6%), but our agents' expertise often results in higher sale prices that more than offset the commission.

faqs.question: What types of houses do you buy in Las Vegas?
faqs.answer: We buy all types of properties in the Las Vegas Valley: single-family homes, condos, townhomes, multi-family properties, and even land. We buy in any condition—from move-in ready to completely distressed. Location doesn't matter: Henderson, Summerlin, North Las Vegas, downtown—we cover the entire valley.

faqs.question: How do you determine your cash offer?
faqs.answer: We analyze recent comparable sales in your neighborhood, assess your property's condition, and factor in current market conditions. Our goal is to make you a fair offer that reflects true market value while accounting for the speed and convenience we provide.

faqs.question: Is Alchemy Investments RE a licensed company?
faqs.answer: Yes! We are a fully licensed Nevada real estate brokerage (License #S.0184768) with over 10 years of experience in the Las Vegas market. We operate professionally, transparently, and ethically in every transaction.

faqs.question: Do you buy houses in Henderson, Summerlin, and other Las Vegas areas?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We buy houses throughout the entire Las Vegas Valley, including Henderson, Summerlin, North Las Vegas, Boulder City, downtown Las Vegas, and all surrounding neighborhoods. If it's in the Vegas metro area, we're interested.

faqs.question: What if I'm behind on payments or facing foreclosure?
faqs.answer: We can help! We've worked with many homeowners in difficult financial situations. Our quick closing timeline (7-14 days) can help you avoid foreclosure and protect your credit. Contact us immediately if you're facing foreclosure—the sooner we talk, the more options you'll have.

faqs.question: Can I sell if I have tenants in the property?
faqs.answer: Yes! We buy tenant-occupied properties all the time. You don't need to evict your tenants or wait for them to leave. We can work around the existing tenancy or take over the lease—whatever works best for your situation.

testimonials.name: Bobby Johnson
testimonials.content: After my tenants trashed the property, I didn't know what to do. Alchemy Investments gave me an honest assessment and a fair cash offer. They showed me the numbers—repair costs vs their offer—and it made total sense. The whole process was straightforward and stress-free.

testimonials.name: Cena Jordan
testimonials.content: Selling my grandmother's house was emotional and overwhelming. The team at Alchemy Investments was incredibly kind and made everything so clear. They walked me through every step and made what could have been a nightmare into a smooth experience. I can't thank them enough.

cta.heading: Ready to Sell Your Las Vegas House Fast?
